description: Table definitions for the generic schema. These tables can be used for any protocol.

tables.label: Incentive Claim Data
tables.description: Transactional data on user level incentives claimed data.

log_index.description: The event log. For transactions that don't emit event, create arbitrary index starting from 0.

user_address.description: The address of the user who claimed the incentives.

claimed_token_address.description: The smart contract address of the claimed token.

claimed_token_amount.description: The amount of the token claimed, decimal normalized.

claimed_token_usd.description: The amount of claimed tokens in USD.

other_incentive_usd.description: Any incentives outside of the claimed token, in this transaction, summed up in USD terms.

airdrop_timestamp.description: The timestamp the airdrop was given to the user.

user_address.description: The address of the user claiming the airdrop.

claim_timestamp.description: The timestamp of when the user claimed the airdrop.

log_index.description: The event log. For transactions that don't emit event, create arbitrary index starting from 0.

airdrop_token_address.description: The smart contract address of the airdropped token.

airdrop_token_symbol.description: The symbol of the token being airdropped.

token_amount.description: The amount of each token airdropped, decimal normalized.

amount_usd.description: The USD value of the airdropped tokens.

tables.label: Pool Snapshot
tables.description: APR and APY data at the pool level.

block_date.description: The timestamp truncated (ie, 2023-03-04 in YYYY-MM-DD format).

protocol_type.description: The type of protocol (ie, Lending, CDP, DEX, Gaming, etc).

pool_address.description: The smart contract address of the pool.

pool_name.description: The name of the pool (ie, pool() in the smart contract, if it exists).

total_value_locked_usd.description: The total value locked within this pool in USD.

supply_apr.description: The annual percentage rate of this pool at the snapshot.

supply_apy.description: The annual percentage yield of the pool.

tables.label: Protocol Snapshot
tables.description: Protocol level snapshot focused on incentives and users.

block_date.description: The timestamp truncated (ie, 2023-03-04 in YYYY-MM-DD format).

daily_active_users.description: The number of unique daily active users on this protocol.

transaction_count.description: The number of transactions in this time period.

fees_usd.description: The amount of fees in this given period, decimal normalized.

block_date.description: The timestamp truncated (ie, 2023-03-04 in YYYY-MM-DD format).

user_address.description: The address of the user this snapshot activity is based on.

token_address.description: The smart contract address of the token.

token_symbol.description: The symbol of the token we are getting the balance of.

token_amount.description: The amount of the token at the given snapshot timestamp (decimal normalized).

token_amount_usd.description: The amount of the token in USD.

tables.label: User Transaction Fee Snapshot
tables.description: Gas and transaction snapshot data at the user level.

block_date.description: The timestamp truncated (ie, 2023-03-04 in YYYY-MM-DD format).

user_address.description: The address of the user this snapshot activity is based on.

transaction_count.description: The number of transactions this user has signed in the given snapshot.

transaction_fees.description: The total amount of gas used in the transactions occurring in the given snapshot (in the native gas amount).

transaction_fees_usd.description: (Optional, if possible) The total amount of gas used in USD terms in the given snapshot.
